panel.title: Systems mapped vs unmapped to an Application ID

search.query: | inputlookup kvs_scmdb_system | eventstats count as "total" | eval mapped_application_id=if(sys_application_id=="","Unmapped","Mapped") | eventstats count as "mapped_count" by mapped_application_id | eval percent=(mapped_count/total)*100 | stats values(percent) by mapped_application_id
